languages.text: {n}Голоса заходятся клекочущим смехом.{/n} "Сироты Принца следуют теми же тропами, что и слуги трупа на троне — тропы, что сплетает Ткач. Предел предсказал последний восход — и тот свершился, пускай творившие его и не знали, чему служит их деяние".

{n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."
languages.original_text: {n}Голоса заходятся клекочущим смехом.{/n} "Сироты Принца следуют теми же тропами, что и слуги трупа на троне — тропы, что сплетает Ткач. Предел предсказал последний восход — и тот свершился, пускай творившие его и не знали, чему служит их деяние".

traits.locale_text: {n}Voices burst into clicking laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as corpse emperor's servants do, the ones woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it happened, even though its conductors were not aware what their deed served to."

{n}Voices burst into clicking laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as corpse emperor's servants do, the ones woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it happened, even though its conductors were not aware what their deed served to."

{n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's Orphans follow the same paths as the Corpse Emperor's servants — ones woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it has happened, though its makers could not design the ends to their efforts."

{n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's Orphans follow the same paths as the Corpse Emperor's servants — ones woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it has happened, though its makers could not design the ends to their efforts."

{n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

languages.text: {n}那些声音爆发出了刺耳的笑声。{/n}“王子的遗孤们与尸皇的仆从们踏上了同样的道路——由命运编织者编织的道路。破晓锋刃预言了终末黎明的到来，而这一切也已然发生。只不过，造成当下结果的那些人，对命运的安排却一无所知。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

traits.locale_text: {n}那些声音爆发出了刺耳的笑声。{/n}“王子的遗孤们与尸皇的仆从们踏上了同样的道路——由命运编织者编织的道路。破晓锋刃预言了终末黎明的到来，而这一切也已然发生。只不过，造成当下结果的那些人，对命运的安排却一无所知。”

languages.text: {n}Les voix éclatent d'un rire strident.{/n} « Les orphelins du Prince suivent les mêmes voies que les sbires de l'Empereur-cadavre : celles créées par le Tisseur. La Lame avait prédit l'Aube finale qui a effectivement eu lieu, même si ses artisans n'avaient pas la moindre idée de ce que cela engendrerait. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les voix éclatent d'un rire strident.{/n} « Les orphelins du Prince suivent les mêmes voies que les sbires de l'empereur-cadavre : celles créées par le Tisseur. La Lame avait prédit l'Aube finale qui a effectivement eu lieu, même si ses artisans n'avaient pas la moindre idée de ce que cela engendrerait. »

languages.text: {n}声は突然甲高い笑いに変わる。{/n}「皇子の遺児たちは、死体の皇帝の下僕たち…ウィーヴァーによて編み込まれた者たちと同じ道を辿る。刃は最後の夜明けを予見し、その通りとなったが、その創り手たちは、自らが織りの中にあることなど知らなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

traits.locale_text: {n}声は突然甲高い笑いに変わる。{/n}「皇子の遺児たちは、死体の皇帝の下僕たち…ウィーヴァーによて編み込まれた者たちと同じ道を辿る。刃は最後の夜明けを予見し、その通りとなったが、その創り手たちは、自らが織りの中にあることなど知らなかったのだ」

languages.text: {n}Las voces sueltan una risa chirriante.{/n} «Los Huérfanos del Príncipe siguen las mismas rutas que los sirvientes del emperador cadáver: las que el Tejedor les prepara a sus lacayos. El Filo predijo el Amanecer Final, y así ha sucedido, aunque sus creadores no fueran conscientes del diseño que seguían».
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las voces sueltan una risa chirriante.{/n} «Los Huérfanos del Príncipe siguen las mismas rutas que los sirvientes del emperador cadáver: las que el Tejedor les prepara a sus lacayos. El Filo predijo el Amanecer Final, y así ha sucedido, aunque sus creadores no fueran conscientes del diseño que seguían».

languages.text: {n}Die Stimmen brechen in kreischendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Die Waisen des Prinzen folgen denselben Pfaden wie die Lakaien des Leichenimperators ... Pfaden, die vom Weber gewoben wurden. Der Rand hat die Letzte Dämmerung prophezeit und sie kam, obschon ihre Schöpfer nichts von ihrer Ausgestaltung wussten."
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimmen brechen in kreischendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Die Waisen des Prinzen folgen denselben Pfaden wie die Lakaien des Leichenimperators ... Pfaden, die vom Weber gewoben wurden. Der Rand hat die Letzte Dämmerung prophezeit und sie kam, obschon ihre Schöpfer nichts von ihrer Ausgestaltung wussten."

{n}Die Stimmen brechen in kreischendes Gelächter aus.{/n} "Die Waisen des Prinzen folgen denselben Pfaden wie die Diener des Leichenimperators — Pfaden, die vom Weber gewebt wurden. Der Rand hat die Letzte Dämmerung vorhergesagt, und so ist es gekommen. Auch wenn seine Schöpfer das Ende ihrer Bestrebungen nicht formen konnten."

languages.text: {n}Sesler, kulak tırmalayan bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Prens'in yetimleri, ceset imparatorun dalkavuklarıyla aynı yolu, Dokuyan'ın ördüğü yolu izler. Yalım, Tan Vakti'ni öngördü. Onu ortaya koyanlar amacı hakkında bilgi sahibi olmasa da öngörü gerçekleşti."
languages.original_text: {n}The voices burst into screeching laughter.{/n} "The Prince's orphans follow the same paths as the corpse emperor's lackeys — paths woven by the Weaver. The Edge foretold the Final Dawn, and so it came to be, though its makers knew nothing of its design."
